item.title: Far Cry TV Series in Development at FX
item.content:encoded:
A live-action Far Cry TV series has been officially announced for FX. Furthermore, as the rumors suggested, the brains behind Alien: Earth and It‚Äôs Always Sunny in Philadelphia are working on it.

The Far Cry series has been a staple of the survival FPS genre since its first release in 2004. Since then, each entry has reinvented itself as an anthology, going to various locations around the world. However, it‚Äôs great shooting and often brilliant villains (portrayed by big-name actors like Giancarlo Esposito and Troy Baker) keep fans coming back. While it‚Äôs been four years since Far Cry‚Äôs last release, Far Cry 6, we now have a new official project: a primetime TV show.

FX‚Äôs Far Cry TV Show Announced, Created by Noah Hawley and Rob Mac

Variety broke the news first, announcing that FX has ordered a Far Cry TV series. It‚Äôll be executive-produced by Alien: Earth and Fargo director Noah Hawley and It‚Äôs Always Sunny in Philadelphia actor Rob Mac. In the article, it‚Äôs mentioned that the show will be an anthology, like the games, in that each season will have a different cast and story. For the first season, while details aren‚Äôt given, Rob Mac is set to star in it. The show is set to stream on Hulu in the US and Disney+ internationally.

Speaking on the collaboration, actor Rob Mac said the following,

‚ÄúGetting to work alongside Noah Hawley is a dream realized,‚Äù states Mac. ‚ÄúUbisoft has been remarkably generous, entrusting us with one of the most iconic video-game worlds ever created. And through it all, my FX family continues to lift me up with their constant belief and support.‚Äù

In addition, Noah Hawley spoke to Variety on the Far Cry show, saying,

‚ÄúWhat I love about the ‚ÄòFar Cry‚Äô game franchise is it‚Äôs an anthology. Each game is a variation of a theme, the same way each season of ‚ÄòFargo‚Äô is a variation on a theme,‚Äù Hawley says. ‚ÄúTo create a big action show that can change from year to year, while always exploring the nature of humanity through this complex and chaotic lens is a dream come true. I‚Äôm excited to partner with Rob and bring our shared irreverent, ambitious sensibility to the screen.‚Äù

Unfortunately, no date or additional casting has been announced as of yet. Still, given both Rob and Noah‚Äôs history with FX, Far Cry seems to be in very good hands. As a fan, it‚Äôll be interesting to see where the first season goes.

What do you think about Far Cry getting a TV show? Think Rob Mac and Noah Hawley can do it justice? What‚Äôs your favorite entry in the series? Let us know in the comments and on the official Insider Gaming Discord!

For more adaptations, check out our articles on The Legend of Zelda and the upcoming Resident Evil film. Don‚Äôt forget to subscribe to our weekly newsletter!

item.title: Last Letter Codes (November 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Last Letter monthly redeem codes for November 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free spins and much more.

Last Letter is a wordplay-based Roblox experience that shares the same environmental design as the prominent shooter title Rivals. The gameplay depends entirely on your knowledge of words and the overall English lexicon. While this can be a strong way to win, you‚Äôll also need Styles. Styles are in-game features that provide users with special abilities that can be used mid-game or strategically, especially when you‚Äôre losing. Redeem the active Last Letter codes to fill your treasury with free Spins. Use these Spins to obtain the best Styles and get a red-hot winning streak.

Active Last Letter Codes

  • 2KLIKES ‚Äì 5 Spins (New)
  • 1MVISITS ‚Äì 5 Spins

Inactive Last Letter Codes

  • 1KLIKES 
  • RELEASE  
  • 100KVISITS 

How To Redeem Last Letter Codes?

Before you start the game and redeem the active codes, you must like the game on the Roblox page and join its official community. To do so, follow these steps: 

  1. Search for Last Letter on the Roblox search tab. 
  2. Once inside the homepage, scroll down to find the thumbs-up logo. 
  3. Select the thumbs-up button to like the game. 
  4. Keep scrolling to find the developer‚Äôs name. Click it to open the community window. 
  5. Press the ‚ÄúJoin Community‚Äù button to enter the game‚Äôs official group. 

After doing this, use these instructions to redeem the active codes in Last Letter: 

  1. Launch the game and connect to the server.
  2. Press the ‚ÄúShop‚Äù logo on the left side.
  3. Choose the ‚ÄúCodes‚Äù button to view the code box. 
  4. Enter any code into the empty transparent text box. 
  5. Trigger the ‚ÄúRedeem‚Äù button to activate the code in Last Letter. 

More About Last Letter Codes

Last Letter codes, upon redemption, offer free Spins. Spins are vital in Last Letter since they provide Styes. Styles are nothing but playstyles that enhance your avatar‚Äôs capabilities to perform better in all the letter game modes. There are different types of Styles, each with its own traits. For example, the Upside Down style is for a messy playstyle, where its ability turns the current word upside down for everyone. Similar to this, each Style, when used at the right time, will rewrite your game‚Äôs outcome.

The following are the chance percentages of all the Styles under their specific category: 

Uncommon ‚Äì 63%:

      • Locked In 
      • Basic 
      • Double Down

      Rare ‚Äì 27%:

      • Quick 
      • Stealer 
      • Upside Down

      Epic ‚Äì 9%:

      • Blocker 
      • Mimic
      • Healer
      • Deleter

      Legendary ‚Äì 1%:

      • Finisher 
      • Reverse
      • Skipper 

      The Pity chance can expand up to 100 spins. The more Pity you have, the better your chances of landing on the finest Styles. All the Legendary and Epic Styles will boost your gameplay tactics and can turn the tables of any losing match. 

      FAQs On Last Letter Codes

      What are the latest codes in Last Letter?

      2KLIKES is the only latest active code in Last Letter. 

      How often are new codes released in Last Letter?

      You can expect new codes to debut during milestones and other in-game events. 

      Can you claim free Guns by redeeming the active Last Letter codes?

      As of now, none of the codes can be redeemed for Guns. However, you can use Tokens, the in-game currency, to purchase various Guns. 

      Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.

      Real-time news, exclusive podcasts, push alerts, and a better reading experience.

      Available on Android

item.title: Budapest Major Protestors Face Sabotage Bounty From Casino Founder
item.content:encoded:
If you want to earn an easy $2,500, you‚Äôd better step up and identify who it was that protested Valve‚Äôs ‚Äòcensorship‚Äô of Gamdom‚Äôs branding at the StarLadder Budapest Major. Hours ago, footage surfaced online of protestors wielding ‚Äòf*** Valve‚Äô signs and demanding that the company reinstate Imperial‚Äôs new logo sticker, which featured Gamdom branding.

The group wore t-shirts that identified them as Gamdom representatives, but the casino‚Äôs founder came out on social media to suggest it was an act of sabotage by a competitor, and promised $2,500 for information leading to the identification of the wrongdoers.

And It‚Äôs Only The First Stage

Images and videos surfaced online showing six protestors at the StarLadder Budapest Major, a $1.25 million Counter-Strike 2 tournament. These protestors wore shirts that spelled ‚ÄòModmag‚Äô, which is Gamdom backwards, and they were there to ‚Äòprotest‚Äô the recent change by Valve that removed a gambling reference from Imperial Esports‚Äô sticker.

As if it wasn‚Äôt bad enough that the event had already been hit with audio issues and the incorrect lining up of highlight clips by the stream‚Äôs editors.

Here‚Äôs the clip from a channel on social media:

In a shocking response, the founder of Gamdom, Felix R√∂mer, commented under the post declaring the protest an act of sabotage by a competing casino.

He wrote:

This is NOT Gamdom or Imperial ‚Äúprotesting‚Äù This is an effort to sabotage us more by a competitor Paying a $2.5k bounty per person that is identified here holding up the signs, we are going to take legal action, this bs doesn‚Äôt belong to the majors.

However, fans of the Counter-Strike scene were quick to pick apart R√∂mer, suggesting that it‚Äôs his company that doesn‚Äôt belong in the competitive gaming scene.

Who do you think is in the wrong here, and is there a deeper conspiracy at play? Let everyone know what you‚Äôre thinking on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming esports, check out the news that FaZe Clan fans aren‚Äôt happy with the new team jersey

item.title: Everything We Know About Playboi Carti Fortnite Skin
item.content:encoded:
Nothing is off the table for Fortnite anymore, so when it‚Äôs rumored that a Playboi Carti Fortnite skin could be added to the in-game store, it‚Äôs believable. Here‚Äôs the latest on the Playboi Carti Fortnite Skin leak, if it‚Äôs true, and more.

Another small-fry name has been outed for Fortnite: A small-time rapper with nearly 50 million followers on Spotify, number one albums, and a bunch of other successes. Obvious banter aside, Playboi Carti has established themself as one of the most prominent and mainstream rap artists on the planet.

What could be bigger than Playboi Carti? Why, a collaboration between Fortnite and Playboi Carti. Let‚Äôs see if it‚Äôs true.

Is Playboi Carti Coming To Fortnite?

Multiple leaks indicated that Playboi Carti was indeed on the way to Fortnite with at least one skin as part of a unique crossover, and then the rapper themself seemed to confirm the collab on Instagram.

Usual leaker Shiina was one of many to suggest a Playboi Carti skin was coming at the very least. The official Playboi Carti Instagram posted a very interesting image to the rapper‚Äôs story to bolster the claim.

It‚Äôs a very simple and obvious clue: A giant Fortnite logo.

Unless this is either a giant coincidence or evil trolling, it‚Äôs safe to assume that Playboi Carti is coming to the live-service shooter in one form or another.

Which Playboi Carti Content Will Be Included In Fortnite?

The Playboi Carti content isn‚Äôt official, but leaks indicate that the game is receiving at least one Playboi Carti skin, and perhaps even a special in-game event to go with it.

Happy Power thinks a skin is a guarantee, and says the content: ‚ÄúWill feature the ‚ÄòEvil Jordan‚Äô outfit as well.

The attire in question relates to Playboi Carti‚Äôs song Evil Jordan, where the singer has a Batman/demon-esuqe head garment, with a red bandana and other eye-catching qualities.

Kurrco has gone one better and claimed an ‚ÄòIn-game event‚Äô is also planned.

Until anything is official, take any information with a pinch of salt. But it would be another in the never-ending conveyor belt of crossovers and special skins if it happens.

Where would a Playboi Carti bundle or special items rank on your wanted list? Is Epic and Fortnite‚Äôs pulling power officially unlimited? Share your thoughts on the rumored crossover and future Fortnite content in general over at the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

Speaking of Fortnite content, check out Epic Adding Animated Favorites as Sidekicks, and Fortnite Getting A Back to the Future Collaboration For Chapter 7.
